results.content:
there was no real authorization in the course
login and password are hardcoded

response.content: There is real authorization, just not JWT based. Login and password are hardcoded because doing extra work to create an extra table, make these dynamic and retrieve them from the database just unnecessarily prolongs the course and adds nothing to it, that stuff should be easy for anyone who understands the code in this project, it's just a matter of simply retrieving stuff from the database.
